segment.source: Use the topics in this section to learn how to set up and use Enterprise Mode and the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager in your company.
segment.target: Use the topics in this section to learn how to set up and use Enterprise Mode and the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager in your company.

segment.source: Set up Enterprise Mode logging and data collection
segment.target: Set up Enterprise Mode logging and data collection

segment.source: Guidance about how to turn on local control of Enterprise Mode and how to use ASP or the GitHub sample to collect data from your local computers.

segment.source: Enterprise Mode schema v.2 guidance
segment.target: Enterprise Mode schema v.2 guidance

segment.source: Guidance about how to write the XML for your site list, including what not to include, how to use trailing slashes, and info about how to target specific sites.
segment.target: Guidance about how to write the XML for your site list, including what not to include, how to use trailing slashes, and info about how to target specific sites.

segment.target: Enterprise Mode schema v.1 guidance
